vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_17.sol:

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_17.sol#29-38):
	-require(bool)(token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),to,amount)) patch_17.sol#37
